plot_corr_summary¶

gwasr.utils.plot_utils.plot_corr_summary(gps_list, corr_list, title, plot_name, save_path, save_ext='png')¶

Summary of correlations for each GPS for a certain imf.

Parameters
gps_listlist

gps

corr_listlist

correlations

titlestr

plot title

plot_namestr

plot name

save_pathstr

save path

save_extstr

plot extension
